codeSystems.name: EditFlagsCS
codeSystems.title: Birth Edit Flags
codeSystems.description: This code system contains codes to represent edit flags specific to BFDR. Additional edit flag codes are located in [CodeSystemEditFlagsVitalRecords](https://hl7.org/fhir/us/vr-common-library/2024Jan/CodeSystem-CodeSystem-vr-edit-flags.html)

codeSystems.name: LocalBFDRCodesCS
codeSystems.title: Local BFDR Codes
codeSystems.description: Local Codes for concepts in BFDR that lack an appropriate LOINC or SCT code
